mosinstall.name: BSQ Sitestats Summary
mosinstall.author: Brent Stolle
mosinstall.license: This module is released under the GNU/GPL License
mosinstall.description: This module displays a summary of data collected from the bsq_sitestats component in two columns: total hits and unique visitors.

param.name: cachetime
param.label: Cache Timeout
param.description: Cache this page for how many seconds?

param.name: showtotal
param.label: Show TOTAL counts for hits and unique visitors

param.name: showtoday
param.label: Show TODAY's counts for total hits and unique visitors

param.name: showthisweek
param.label: Show THIS WEEK's counts for total hits and unique visitors

param.name: showthismonth
param.label: Show THIS MONTH's counts for total hits and unique visitors

param.name: showthisyear
param.label: Show THIS YEAR's counts for total hits and unique visitors

param.name: cssprepend
param.label: CSS Class Prepend
param.description: Prefix for all classes used in this module
